line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: Untitled
* DESCRIPTION:
* AUTHOR: DATE: 25 January 2015
* | [Find.Multiple]
* $Salvager.RemoteSystemControlLevel = 25
* $Minerals = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS]
* $Natural = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_NATURAL]
* $Bio = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_BIO]
* $Energy = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY]
* $Food = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_FOOD]
* $Tech = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_TECH]
* $AmountOnShip = [THIS]-> get amount of ware {Remote System Control Software} in cargo bay
* if $AmountOnShip
* * very expensive ware so we actively scan when it's equipped
* [THIS]-> begin task 120 with script 'al.Phanon.CheckScanner' and priority 1: arg1='Salvager' arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
* end
* $RandomSector = null
* while !$RandomSector
* $RandomSector = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Wan.GetRandomSectorMinusEnemies' : StartSector=$CurrentSector Jumps=$Jumps
* = wait 5 ms
* end
* = [THIS]-> call script '!move.jumptosector' : targetsector=$RandomSector jumptoo=[FALSE]
* start in a random location and work it from there
* set up the starting level of the salvager
* if starting and we already have more drones than reserve increase reserve so we don't sell the extra ones we have
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon Salvager starting, %s/%s', [this], [sector], $Value, $Value, $Value
* $Experience=25
* Primary loop
* gosub WonderLocally:
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s generating %s sectors to scan. Exp %s',[this],$MaximumSectorsToScan, $Experience, $Value, $Value
* enemy ship scan is done when trying to jump to the sector instead
* $EnemyShip = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.math.detectenemy' : Sector=$Sector MaxDist=null Maxnum=null ClassOrType=null RefPos=null CheckSectorIsEnemy=[TRUE]
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) contemplating %s. %s', [THIS], $Sector, $EnemyShip, $Value, $Value
* if !$EnemyShip
* No enemy ships here at the time of scanning at least (more trying to avoid LT installments)
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) Will look at %s', [THIS], $Sector, $SearchingSector, $Value, $Value
* end
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s buying energy',[this],[sector], $Value, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s at %s',[this],[sector], $Value, $Value, $Value
* Check for the minimum levels
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) looking at %s, %s/%s', [THIS], $SectorInvestigating, $SectorPosition,$ArraySize,null
* Added for SWLU to prevent ships with full health from being salvaged
* Added for SWLU to prevent ships with full health from being salvaged
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s found crate or ship in %s. (%s/%s)', [this], $SectorInvestigating, $crates, $targetship, $Value
* [THIS]-> begin task 90 with script 'Lib.Wan.Cmd.FlyUntil.NeutralShiporWaresFoundInScanner' and priority 10: arg1=[Moveable Ship] arg2=30000 arg3=$MaxScanLVLDist arg4=null arg5=null
* [THIS]-> begin task 90 with script '!lib.interrupt' and priority 10000: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
* Fly towards a sector while simultaniously scanning for wares
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s taking up a random position at %s', [this], [sector], [SECTOR], $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s looking in inventory in %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], $WareAmount, $Value, $Value
* $InventoryCheck = $Minerals
* gosub SellInventoryCheck:
* $InventoryCheck = $Natural
* gosub SellInventoryCheck:
* $InventoryCheck = $Bio
* gosub SellInventoryCheck:
* $InventoryCheck = $Energy
* gosub SellInventoryCheck:
* $InventoryCheck = $Food
* gosub SellInventoryCheck:
* $InventoryCheck = $Tech
* gosub SellInventoryCheck:
* $WareAmount = [THIS]-> get amount of ware $Ware in cargo bay
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='looking at %s - %s', $ware, $wareamount, $Value, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s looking at %s/%s', [THIS], $Ware, $WareAmount, $Value, $Value
* don't sell the energy cells if we're just holding our reserve
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s wants to try to sell %s', [THIS], $Ware, $Value, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s allowed to sell %s looking for station', [this], $ware, $Value, $Value, $Value
* found our station, woo
* $Stationowner = $Station-> get true owner
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s chose station %s to sell %s different wares', [this],$station, $Count, $Value, $Value
* Station that was found can't actually buy the ware or is dangerous, no go.
* if we found any wares at all go ahead and sell
* $PrePreCorporationMoney = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.CorpFunds.Get' :
* station can buy the ware from the phanon ship
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) Salvager, sold %s in %s and made %s amount sold %s', [THIS], $Ware, [SECTOR], $Difference, $AmountSold
* $AfterCorporationMoney = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.CorpFunds.Get' :
* $Difference = $AfterCorporationMoney - $PrePreCorporationMoney
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) Salvager, sold in %s and made %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], $Difference, $Difference, $Value
* secondary variable so that ships that are mothballed can communicate the difference over to this script
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s Checking experience. Have %s out of %s', [this], $Salvager.gain, $requiredexp, $MoveTowardsFoundShip, $JumpedSector
* Trader ships use 10000 as their checking variable, increased a lot for salvagers
* Experience increases how many sectors a ship can look at
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s Leveled up to %s', [this], $experience, $TargetShip, $MoveTowardsFoundShip, $JumpedSector
* each level of salvager adds extra searching range, increasing efficiency
* if $experience >= $Salvager.RemoteSystemControlLevel
* $AmountOnShip = [THIS]-> get amount of ware {Remote System Control Software} in cargo bay
* if !$AmountOnShip
* [THIS]-> begin task 120 with script 'al.Phanon.CheckScanner' and priority 1: arg1='Salvager' arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
* = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.AddWareToShip' : Ware={Remote System Control Software} Amount=1 CheckExistingWares=1
* end
* $ShipClaim.HasRemoteSystemControl = [TRUE]
* $ShipClaim.DistantRequirement = 5000
* $ShipClaim.DistantRequirement = $ShipClaim.DistantRequirement + ($experience * 100)
* $ShipClaim.MovementPrecision = 2500 + ($experience * 100)
* else
* end
* each level of salvager adds extra searching range, increasing efficiency
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader move to station, env %s', [this],$Env, $env, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader after move. gathering %s', [this],$GatheringAmount, $env, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader able to load %s', [this],$Loaded, $env, $Value, $Value
* won't wait for HQ to generate more, immediately buy some more
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader getting the rest. gathering %s', [this],$gatheringamount, $env, $Value, $Value
* goto label LookAtSectors:
* Looks like we are done, send towards looking for wares again or start again
* Added for SWLU to prevent ships with full health from being salvaged
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s in %s selected %s to claim (%s)', [THIS], [SECTOR], $Closest.Object, $Closest.Type, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s in %s selected %s to claim (%s)', [THIS], [SECTOR], $Closest.Object, $Closest.Type, $Value
* $ScanOrder = random value between 0 and 1
* if $ScanOrder == 0
* gosub CratesClaim:
* gosub ShipsClaim:
* else
* gosub ShipsClaim:
* gosub CratesClaim:
* end
* if $Crates OR $Ships
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s rescan claimables',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
* rescan encase something new has popped up
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='% looking at %s',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s going to %s',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
* $String = sprintf: fmt='%s jumping to %s in %s', [THIS], $Crate, [SECTOR], $Value, $Value
* display subtitle text: text=$String duration=9999 ms
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s after %s return %s',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
* = [THIS]-> move to position continue: x=$x y=$y z=$z with precision $ShipClaim.MovementPrecision m
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s looping towards %s', [this],$Ship, $Value, $Value, $Value
* $moved = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Cmd.MoveToPosition' : argument1=$x argument2=$y argument3=$z argument4=$ShipClaim.MovementPrecision argument5=20000
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s done looping towards %s', [this],$Ship, $Value, $Value, $Value
* display subtitle text: text='Ship found something to salvage' duration=1000 ms
* slow it down to kind of "simulate" the act of jumping out into a space suit to claim the ship
* $String = sprintf: fmt='%s claimed %s in %s', [THIS], $Ship, [SECTOR], $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook $String
* display subtitle text: text=$String duration=200 ms

sval.val: Handles salvager logic
Salvaged Ship
SCRIPT NAME: Untitled
DESCRIPTION:
AUTHOR: DATE: 25 January 2015
| [Find.Multiple]
$Salvager.RemoteSystemControlLevel = 25
$Minerals = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS]
$Natural = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_NATURAL]
$Bio = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_BIO]
$Energy = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY]
$Food = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_FOOD]
$Tech = get wares of maintype: maintype= [SSTYPE_W_TECH]
$AmountOnShip = [THIS]-> get amount of ware {Remote System Control Software} in cargo bay
if $AmountOnShip
* very expensive ware so we actively scan when it's equipped
[THIS]-> begin task 120 with script 'al.Phanon.CheckScanner' and priority 1: arg1='Salvager' arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
$RandomSector = null
while !$RandomSector
$RandomSector = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Wan.GetRandomSectorMinusEnemies' : StartSector=$CurrentSector Jumps=$Jumps
= wait 5 ms
= [THIS]-> call script '!move.jumptosector' : targetsector=$RandomSector jumptoo=[FALSE]
start in a random location and work it from there
set up the starting level of the salvager
if starting and we already have more drones than reserve increase reserve so we don't sell the extra ones we have
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon Salvager starting, %s/%s', [this], [sector], $Value, $Value, $Value
Primary loop
gosub WonderLocally:
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s generating %s sectors to scan. Exp %s',[this],$MaximumSectorsToScan, $Experience, $Value, $Value
enemy ship scan is done when trying to jump to the sector instead
$EnemyShip = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.math.detectenemy' : Sector=$Sector MaxDist=null Maxnum=null ClassOrType=null RefPos=null CheckSectorIsEnemy=[TRUE]
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) contemplating %s. %s', [THIS], $Sector, $EnemyShip, $Value, $Value
if !$EnemyShip
No enemy ships here at the time of scanning at least (more trying to avoid LT installments)
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) Will look at %s', [THIS], $Sector, $SearchingSector, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s buying energy',[this],[sector], $Value, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s at %s',[this],[sector], $Value, $Value, $Value
Check for the minimum levels
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) looking at %s, %s/%s', [THIS], $SectorInvestigating, $SectorPosition,$ArraySize,null
Added for SWLU to prevent ships with full health from being salvaged
Added for SWLU to prevent ships with full health from being salvaged
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s found crate or ship in %s. (%s/%s)', [this], $SectorInvestigating, $crates, $targetship, $Value
[THIS]-> begin task 90 with script 'Lib.Wan.Cmd.FlyUntil.NeutralShiporWaresFoundInScanner' and priority 10: arg1=[Moveable Ship] arg2=30000 arg3=$MaxScanLVLDist arg4=null arg5=null
[THIS]-> begin task 90 with script '!lib.interrupt' and priority 10000: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
Fly towards a sector while simultaniously scanning for wares
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s taking up a random position at %s', [this], [sector], [SECTOR], $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s looking in inventory in %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], $WareAmount, $Value, $Value
$InventoryCheck = $Minerals
gosub SellInventoryCheck:
$InventoryCheck = $Natural
gosub SellInventoryCheck:
$InventoryCheck = $Bio
gosub SellInventoryCheck:
$InventoryCheck = $Energy
gosub SellInventoryCheck:
$InventoryCheck = $Food
gosub SellInventoryCheck:
$InventoryCheck = $Tech
gosub SellInventoryCheck:
$WareAmount = [THIS]-> get amount of ware $Ware in cargo bay
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='looking at %s - %s', $ware, $wareamount, $Value, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s looking at %s/%s', [THIS], $Ware, $WareAmount, $Value, $Value
don't sell the energy cells if we're just holding our reserve
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s wants to try to sell %s', [THIS], $Ware, $Value, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s allowed to sell %s looking for station', [this], $ware, $Value, $Value, $Value
found our station, woo
$Stationowner = $Station-> get true owner
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s chose station %s to sell %s different wares', [this],$station, $Count, $Value, $Value
Station that was found can't actually buy the ware or is dangerous, no go.
if we found any wares at all go ahead and sell
$PrePreCorporationMoney = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.CorpFunds.Get' :
station can buy the ware from the phanon ship
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) Salvager, sold %s in %s and made %s amount sold %s', [THIS], $Ware, [SECTOR], $Difference, $AmountSold
$AfterCorporationMoney = [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.CorpFunds.Get' :
$Difference = $AfterCorporationMoney - $PrePreCorporationMoney
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='(%s) Salvager, sold in %s and made %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], $Difference, $Difference, $Value
secondary variable so that ships that are mothballed can communicate the difference over to this script
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s Checking experience. Have %s out of %s', [this], $Salvager.gain, $requiredexp, $MoveTowardsFoundShip, $JumpedSector
Trader ships use 10000 as their checking variable, increased a lot for salvagers
Experience increases how many sectors a ship can look at
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s Leveled up to %s', [this], $experience, $TargetShip, $MoveTowardsFoundShip, $JumpedSector
each level of salvager adds extra searching range, increasing efficiency
if $experience >= $Salvager.RemoteSystemControlLevel
$AmountOnShip = [THIS]-> get amount of ware {Remote System Control Software} in cargo bay
if !$AmountOnShip
[THIS]-> begin task 120 with script 'al.Phanon.CheckScanner' and priority 1: arg1='Salvager' arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
= [THIS]-> call script 'al.Phanon.AddWareToShip' : Ware={Remote System Control Software} Amount=1 CheckExistingWares=1
$ShipClaim.HasRemoteSystemControl = [TRUE]
$ShipClaim.DistantRequirement = 5000
$ShipClaim.DistantRequirement = $ShipClaim.DistantRequirement + ($experience * 100)
$ShipClaim.MovementPrecision = 2500 + ($experience * 100)
each level of salvager adds extra searching range, increasing efficiency
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader move to station, env %s', [this],$Env, $env, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader after move. gathering %s', [this],$GatheringAmount, $env, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader able to load %s', [this],$Loaded, $env, $Value, $Value
won't wait for HQ to generate more, immediately buy some more
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s trader getting the rest. gathering %s', [this],$gatheringamount, $env, $Value, $Value
goto label LookAtSectors:
Looks like we are done, send towards looking for wares again or start again
Added for SWLU to prevent ships with full health from being salvaged
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s in %s selected %s to claim (%s)', [THIS], [SECTOR], $Closest.Object, $Closest.Type, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s in %s selected %s to claim (%s)', [THIS], [SECTOR], $Closest.Object, $Closest.Type, $Value
$ScanOrder = random value between 0 and 1
if $ScanOrder == 0
gosub CratesClaim:
gosub ShipsClaim:
gosub ShipsClaim:
gosub CratesClaim:
if $Crates OR $Ships
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s rescan claimables',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
rescan encase something new has popped up
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='% looking at %s',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s going to %s',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
$String = sprintf: fmt='%s jumping to %s in %s', [THIS], $Crate, [SECTOR], $Value, $Value
display subtitle text: text=$String duration=9999 ms
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s after %s return %s',[this], $Crate, $X, $Value, $Value
= [THIS]-> move to position continue: x=$x y=$y z=$z with precision $ShipClaim.MovementPrecision m
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s looping towards %s', [this],$Ship, $Value, $Value, $Value
$moved = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Cmd.MoveToPosition' : argument1=$x argument2=$y argument3=$z argument4=$ShipClaim.MovementPrecision argument5=20000
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='%s done looping towards %s', [this],$Ship, $Value, $Value, $Value
display subtitle text: text='Ship found something to salvage' duration=1000 ms
slow it down to kind of "simulate" the act of jumping out into a space suit to claim the ship
$String = sprintf: fmt='%s claimed %s in %s', [THIS], $Ship, [SECTOR], $Value, $Value
write to player logbook $String
display subtitle text: text=$String duration=200 ms
